original_title: Leslie Sansone: Walk at Home: 3 Mile Weight Loss Walk
overview: 3 miles in 45 mins. is a real multi-muscle, mega calorie burn. You can POWER WALK at Home!! Fun music that's paced perfectly to keep you walking at just the right fat burning speed! You'll condition the legs, flatten the tummy, and tone the arms - all while you WALK at home!  It's your choice to BOOST the walk by adding our comfy Soft Hand Weights. Some of the walkers use weights; some just WALK, WALK, WALK! End this energetic workout with a relaxing stretch for legs, back, and core!
title: Leslie Sansone: Walk at Home: 3 Mile Weight Loss Walk
